title: Finance & Admin Officer Job at Future Moves Recruitment Agency Limited
content:
Future Moves Recruitment Agency Limited is a licensed HR firm with expertise in human capital development, talent sourcing, learning & development, HR outsourcing, and more. Our personalized, innovative, and reliable services have led to 75% client referrals, showcasing our commitment to excellence.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance & Admin Officer
Job Location: Abuja (On-site)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Finance & Admin Officer ensures smooth internal operations and financial accountability by handling bookkeeping, payroll, budgeting, and administrative functions. The role supports daily business needs and backend organization.


Key Responsibilities


	Record daily income, expenses, and order transactions.
	Track payments across channels (POS, transfers) and confirm receipts.
	Process monthly payroll and monitor staff attendance.
	Manage petty cash, reimbursements, and expense tracking.
	Maintain files: receipts, invoices, contracts, and staff records.
	Monitor budgets, flag cashflow issues, and support financial planning.
	Prepare monthly financial reports and analysis.
	Document internal processes and coordinate administrative activities.
	Schedule meetings, track deliverables, and maintain calendars.
	Assist with statutory remittances like taxes and pensions.
	Support team logistics including document filing and office errands.


Requirements


	BSc or HND in Accounting, Business Administration, or related field.
	2 years of experience in finance or admin support (preferably within SMEs).
	Strong Excel or Google Sheets proficiency; accounting software is a plus.


Skills & Traits:


	Strong reporting and record-keeping abilities.
	Accuracy, confidentiality, and integrity.
	Basic understanding of HR/compliance practices.
	Highly organized, trustworthy, and self-motivated.
	Effective communicator and team player.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send CV to: recruiter.b@fmragency.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Head, Procurement",
  "description": "Sahara Group is a leading international energy and infrastructure conglomerate with operations in over 38 countries across Africa, Middle East, Europe and Asia. Spanning three decades, we have broken ground and challenged stereotypes across the global business landscape. The women and men who make up our organization are our strongest levers for growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Head, Procurement

Job Identification: 381
Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full Time

Role Accountabilities
Strategic Procurement &amp; Category Management:


	Develop, implement, and continuously optimize category strategies across direct and indirect spend categories (including fleet, CAPEX, services, IT, energy, and operations).
	Integrate AI and analytics for spend forecasting, risk profiling, and supplier segmentation.
	Apply Total Cost of Ownership (TCO), value engineering, and cost control frameworks to procurement planning.
	Incorporate ESG criteria and circular economy principles into category strategies and sourcing decisions.
